channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow futures rise as enough Democrats join Republicans to end the shutdown and ‘surrender’ on ACA subsidies
item.description: The breakthrough comes as Transportation Secretary Scott Duffy has issued dire warnings about air travel ahead of Thanksgiving.

item.title: Donald Trump booed as the first sitting US president at a regular-season NFL game since Carter in 1978
item.description: There were boos from some spectators when Trump was shown on the videoboard in the first half and again when he was introduced by the stadium announce...

item.title: Trump Officials Push States to ‘Undo’ Work to Send Full SNAP Benefits
item.description: In late-night guidance, the Agriculture Department also threatened financial penalties against states.

item.title: Sean Duffy Juggles Shutdown Roles on Flight Safety and Trump Support
item.description: With near-daily TV appearances, the transportation secretary has emerged as the face of the Trump administration amid the shutdown.
